\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\[
C\frac{\partial T}{\partial t}-\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left[D(1-x^{2})\frac{\partial T}{\partial x}\right]=S[1-A(V)]-I
\]

\[
\frac{\partial V}{\partial t}=s\frac{1}{C}\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left[D(1-x^{2})\frac{\partial V}{\partial x}\right]+G(T)V(1-V)-d(T)V
\]

\[
G(T)=g_{max}\left\{ 1-\left[w(T_{v}-T)\right]^{2}\right\} 
\]

\end{document}
